headline: Knee Replacement Surgery Market Analysis Report 2025-2035: Stryker, Zimmer Biomet, B. Braun, and DePuy Synthes Lead Innovations by Continually Innovating and Improving Patient Outcomes
summary: Knee replacement surgery effectively addresses severe knee conditions like osteoarthritis, offering pain relief and improved mobility. The procedure sees high demand due to rising osteoarthritis among the aging population, especially as global lifespans increase. Although the surgery significantly enhances life quality, challenges such as high costs and lengthy recovery persist, affecting both patients and healthcare systems.
